title: Frontend Intern
jdSnippet: We build modern UI with React and follow Git workflows. Perfect opportunity for junior developers to grow their skills in a collaborative environment.

title: Backend Developer
jdSnippet: Join our backend team to build scalable APIs with Python and Django. Experience with SQL databases is essential.

title: Full Stack Intern
jdSnippet: Work across our entire stack from React frontends to Node.js backends. Great learning opportunity for ambitious developers.
